October 16, 1954
Hr, Benjamin Shimberg
Assistant to the President
Educational Testing Service
20 Nassau Street
Princeton, New Jersey
Dear Mr* Shimbergt
I am very happy to inform you officially that the Board of Directors of the NAKB
has approved your application in behalf of the Educational Testing Service for
affiliate membership in our association*
Ton will now be receiving regularly from us the monthly NAEB I ewsletter. various
additional publications of interest as they are published, and many other items*
You should, of course, feel free to write to us at any time for any information
you would like concerning educational broadcasting* He will always try to help.
Enclosed you will find a list of the materials available from the NAEB. Please
let us know which of these you would like to receive and we will send them to
you* Under separate cover we are sending you a Directory of Members and the
latest Newsletter, Your certificate of membership will be sent to you soon.
Perhaps the greatest good of an NAEB membership is the associations you form*
It*s good to know that others are having the same problems you are and how they
are solving them. It has been the tradition with NAEB, in its thirty years as*
the association of educators who broadcast, to exchange this sort of information
on a friend-to-frlend basis. You will find lots of friends in the NAEB, and lots
of people with good advice and good staff resources to supplement those which
you have.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
